attributes.action: Make life sentencing actually mean life.
attributes.background: For our Citizenship coursework at school we had to come up with a campaign we wanted to represent. After doing a lot of research in different topics I came across sentencing and all along I have believed that if you take someones life that your life should be taken.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
